md:
giải nghĩa từ "episode" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Episode (noun)

* Meaning: A part of a story, play, or film that is separate from the rest and has its own plot or theme.
* Vietnamese: Tập (phim), phần (của phim), chương (truyện)

Example sentences:

* The latest episode of the TV series was very exciting.
* The episode of the movie was very emotional.

Related words:

* Chapter (noun): A part of a book, especially one that deals with a particular topic or period of time.
* Scene (noun): A part of a play, film, or book that takes place in one location and is usually a single event.
* Segment (noun): A part of a larger whole, especially a part of a TV or radio program.

Antonyms:

* Whole (noun): The entire thing, including all its parts.
* Complete (adjective): Having all the necessary parts or elements.

Note: The word "episode" can also refer to a separate event or incident in a person's life, but this meaning is less common in everyday conversation.
